MBBS Admission in Russia at Altai State Medical University

  • About Altai State Medical University
  • Indian Student Admission Procedure
  • {" "} Eligibility Criteria of Altai State Medical University
  • {" "} Requirements for MBBS Admission

About Altai State Medical University

Altai State Medical University is a well-known{" "} Medical College in Russia {" "} which was founded in the year 1954. It organizes high-quality training programs with leading teams of doctors and pharmaceutics for the regional healthcare system. This university produces a number of international students in several disciplines such as General Medicine, Dentistry, Pediatrics and Pharmacy. It is recognized by the Ministry of Education and Science of Russian Federation. The medium of coaching in this university is English language.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take{" "} MBBS Admission in Russia:

  • {" "} The students need to fill all their details in the application form from the Universitys website.
  • {" "} If the application is accepted, the students will get an invitation letter.
  • {" "} When students get confirmation of the admission, they need to pay the fees.
  • {" "} Then they can apply for the visa once they get the invitation letter.

Eligibility Criteria of Altai State Medical University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to study medical course in Medical College in Russia are as follows:

  • {" "} The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • {" "} The students should be at least 17 years of age to take MBBS admission in Russia.
  • {" "} The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks.
  • {" "} The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS Admission

The necessary documents for taking{" "} MBBS admission in Russia to study in Altai State Medical University are the following:

  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees to Altai State Medical University.
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential
Altai State Medical University Fee Structure

The fee structure of Altai State Medical University is very affordable.

Particulars Fees in USD Fees in INR
Tuition Fee 4,300 3,01,000
Altai State Medical University Facility

Altai State Medical University provides the following facilities:

  • {" "} It has well-equipped classrooms, science and skills laboratories, and a library.
  • {" "} It provides a facility of fully furnished hostels with Indian food.
  • {" "} The students get to study in a safe environment.
Altai State Medical University Advantages for Indian Student
  • {" "} There is no need to give any entrance exam for taking MBBS admission to this top Medical College in Russia.
  • {" "} The cost of living and pursuing MBBS at this university is reasonable.
  • {" "} After completing MBBS from this university, the students have lots of opportunities.
  • {" "} It has affiliated hospitals for providing training as well as internship programs.
  • {" "} There is no need to pay any donation and capitation fees.
  • {" "} This university provides clinical exposure to the students to enhance their practical knowledge.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf Education is the authorized Indian partner with the top Medical College in Russia. We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Russia for pursuing MBBS course in Altai State Medical University that taught MBBS course in English language. We have an expert team of consultants that provide well-researched assistance & comprehensive counseling to the students. We provide complete information about Altai State Medical University and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study MBBS in Russia best Altai State Medical University and fulfill their wish.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.3500 + Students 15 Countries MBBS, MBA, PG, UG 100 % Commitment Education Loan Job Placements
